title: Mini-Ep 209: The Nose Knows
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 209: The Nose Knows
itunes:subtitle: Doree prepares for her two-night book launch event extravaganza and Kate starts running without expectations. Then, listeners ask about when to bail on a skincare product, what to do about a crush conundrum, and if everyone is using poop spray without ...
description:
Doree prepares for her two-night book launch event extravaganza and Kate starts running without expectations. Then, listeners ask about when to bail on a skincare product, what to do about a crush conundrum, and if everyone is using poop spray without them. Plus, a listener calls in with the pronunciation of Worcestershire. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
